name: Wakelyns tree measurements 2009-2019
description: In the mixed timber tree silvoarable system at Wakelyns Agroforestry, Suffolk, planted in February 1994, tree trunk circumference at 1.3 m above ground of all 363 trees in Rows B to M in Far Field has been measured in August 2009, May 2016 and October 2019. Tree height of the same trees has been measured using a clinometer in September 1996, August 2009, May 2016 and October 2019.
data_project_name: A number of projects: SOLID, CO-Free, TWECOM project, AGFORWARD, SustainFarm, WOOFS
access_barrier: No, direct download/access through a web link
data_formats: Widely used file formats (Spreadsheet, JSON, GeoJSON, SHP, GPX, KML, XML, TIFF, MP3, MP4, etc.)
